mapper.select: select qnanum, qnatitle, to_char(qnawritedate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as qnawritedate, qnawriter from qna
mapper.insert: insert into qna(qnanum, qnatitle, qnacontent, qnawritedate, qnaWriter, qnawritepwd) values(qnanum_seq.nextval, #{qnaTitle}, #{qnaContent}, sysdate, #{qnaWriter}, #{qnaWritePwd})
